product_name: REI Tech-Compatible Recycled Fleece Grip Gloves - Men's
long_description: Our REI Tech-Compatible Recycled Fleece Grip men's gloves keep your hands warm when you're walking the dog or taking a hike. And you can leave them on while you operate a touch-screen smartphone. Conductive material at the tips of the thumbs and index fingers allows you to send text messages and operate your touch-screen phone without having to take your gloves off. Midweight recycled Polartec(R) polyester fleece is soft and warm. Include synthetic grippy palms.
short_description: Our REI Tech-Compatible Recycled Fleece Grip men's gloves keep your hands warm when you're walking the dog or taking a hike. And you can leave them on while you operate a touch-screen smartphone.
